price: “Tako je odredio Gospodar tvoj”, rekoše oni, “On je mudar i sveznajući.”
arabic: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū kadhāliki qāla rabbuki innahu huwa al-ḥakīmu al-ʿalīmu
